custom_nodes.author: silveroxides
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Power Shift Scheduler
custom_nodes.description: Highly customizable Scheduler for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: IsItDanOrAi
custom_nodes.title: exLoadout: Excel-Based Model & Settings Loader
custom_nodes.description: Excel spreadsheet-driven ComfyUI nodes that let you load models, values, and workflows based on saved rows in Excel. Great for organizing and switching between CLIPs, VAEs, LoRAs, and more.

custom_nodes.author: company8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_LLM_Hub
custom_nodes.description: A prompt-generator for ComfyUI, utilizing the power of a language model to turn a provided text-to-image prompt into a more detailed and improved prompt.

custom_nodes.author: XmYx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SmolLM3
custom_nodes.description: Welcome to ComfyUI-SmolLM3, where we bring the magic of Hugging Face's SmolLM3 language models into your ComfyUI workflow! Whether you're crafting stories, generating ideas, or building AI-powered creativity tools, this node pack makes it delightfully simple.

custom_nodes.author: reallusion
custom_nodes.title: Reallusion ComfyUI Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This nodepack contains custom nodes for ComfyUI designed specifically for handling Reallusion-related assets such as Character Creator and iClone image and video files. These nodes are intended to be used as backend components that communicate and operate through the AI Render Plugin interface of iClone or Character Creator, enabling a seamless integration between ComfyUI's powerful image/video generation capabilities and Reallusion’s animation tools. By bridging ComfyUI with iClone/Character Creator’s AI Render Plugin, these nodes facilitate workflows where AI-assisted content generation can be controlled, customized, and rendered directly from within Reallusion software environments.

custom_nodes.author: Ben Staniford
custom_nodes.title: Comfy Contact Sheet Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: Displays up to 64 recent images from a folder as numbered thumbnails in a grid contact sheet format, allowing you to select and load one for post-processing

custom_nodes.author: Ben Staniford
custom_nodes.title: Prompt Database for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that provides a database-driven prompt management system. Store, organize, and edit prompts in categories with persistent JSON storage.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageTransform
custom_nodes.description: Apply 2D transformations to images and masks within ComfyUI. Zoom, position, scale, flip, rotate, squash and stretch the input content. Tile images to create patterns (supports alpha channels). Fill options for managing canvas areas exposed by transformations. Apply masks to RGB images and invert mask inputs or outputs. No extra dependencies.

custom_nodes.author: MovieLabs
custom_nodes.title: MovieLabs ComfyUI Nodes for Publishing Workflow
custom_nodes.description: An extension set of validation checks, automatic versioning numbering, automatic directory creation, and naming conventions are implemented to ensure that the file system is kept in sync with ShotGrid.

custom_nodes.author: manifestations
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Outfit Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Advanced, professional outfit and makeup generation nodes for ComfyUI, with dynamic UI and AI-powered prompt formatting.

custom_nodes.author: glitchinthemetrix16
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Roop Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI to enable face swapping using the Roop library.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageEffectLevels
custom_nodes.description: The 'Eses Image Effect Levels' is a ComfyUI custom node that provides a real-time levels adjustment tool directly within the user interface. It allows for interactive control over the tonal range of both images and masks, using a GPU-accelerated PyTorch backend for near instant feedback.

custom_nodes.author: voltans-voice-coach
custom_nodes.description: Displays up to 64 recent images from a folder as numbered thumbnails in a grid contact sheet format, allowing you to select and load one for post-processing
custom_nodes.title: Comfy Contact Sheet Image Loader

custom_nodes.author: BobRandomNumber
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-KyutaiTTS
custom_nodes.description: A non real-time ComfyUI implementation of Kyutai TTS

custom_nodes.author: OneThingAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OneThing AI Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates with OneThing AI's image generation API.

custom_nodes.author: OneThingAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OneThing CV Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to get detailed text descriptions of images using the OneThing AI Vision API. The node integrates with OneThing AI's powerful vision models to provide detailed descriptions of image content.

custom_nodes.author: Ben Staniford
custom_nodes.title: LoRa Loader with Trigger Database
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that provides a LoRa loader with persistent trigger word storage. Automatically saves and loads trigger words for each LoRa model, making your workflow more efficient.

custom_nodes.author: NeuroSenko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LLM SDXL Adapter
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive set of ComfyUI nodes for using Large Language Models (LLM) as text encoders for SDXL image generation through a trained adapter.

custom_nodes.author: linjian-ufo
custom_nodes.title: GLM-4V Image Descriptor
custom_nodes.description:
Professional AI Image Description Generator
Based on Zhipu AI GLM-4V multimodal model, batch generate accurate and detailed descriptions for images in Chinese and English

custom_nodes.author: o-l-l-i
custom_nodes.title: Olm DragCrop for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: An interactive image cropping node for ComfyUI, allowing precise visual selection of crop areas directly within your workflow. This node is designed to streamline the process of preparing images for various tasks, ensuring immediate visual feedback and control over your image dimensions.

custom_nodes.author: PD19 Anime
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PD19Anime-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A powerful suite of nodes for ComfyUI to dynamically load prompts and images. This pack is especially focused on batch processing from a directory and includes two main nodes: Advanced Prompt & Image Loader (Multiple) and Advanced Prompt & Image Loader (single).

custom_nodes.author: Ben Staniford
custom_nodes.title: Comfy Contact Sheet Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for loading images from a contact sheet of recent files

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageEffectCurves
custom_nodes.description: Channel curves custom node for ComfyUI. RGB, R, G and B, luma and saturation curves adjustments. Save and load presets. Real-time curves adjustment tool directly within the user interface. Precise, interactive control over the tonal range of both image channels and masks, using a GPU-accelerated PyTorch backend for instant feedback.

custom_nodes.author: FortunaCournot
custom_nodes.title: Stereoscopic
custom_nodes.description: Contains ImageSBSConverter node to convert an image into a side-by-side image.

custom_nodes.author: Ltamann
custom_nodes.title: TBG’s ComfyUI Development Takeaways
custom_nodes.description: A curated collection of reusable ComfyUI nodes developed by TGB. These sidecodes encapsulate key breakthroughs in model sampling, noise scheduling, and image refinement for enhanced stable diffusion workflows.

custom_nodes.author: gmorks
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Animagine-Prompt
custom_nodes.description: Comfy UI node to prompt build for https://huggingface.co/cagliostrolab/animagine-xl-4.0 model

custom_nodes.author: Ben Staniford
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Load Most Recent Image Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node designed to load the most recent image in a folder

custom_nodes.author: negaga53
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Universal Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: A powerful and versatile custom node for ComfyUI that provides multiple ways to load images into your workflows.

custom_nodes.author: sunra-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sunra.ai Plugin
custom_nodes.description: Professional ComfyUI plugin for Sunra.ai's FLUX.1 Kontext and Seedance models with enhanced UI

custom_nodes.author: robertvoy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Distributed
custom_nodes.description: A custom node extension for ComfyUI that enables distributed image generation across multiple GPUs through a master-worker architecture.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: Display Image with Mask for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a versatile custom node for ComfyUI, Display Image with Mask, designed to offer advanced image viewing, masking, and saving capabilities directly within your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: lum3on
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Midjourney Scraper Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to scrape and download images and videos from the Midjourney showcase pages. It uses undetected_chromedriver to bypass anti-scraping measures, but requires session cookies from a logged-in browser session to function correctly.

custom_nodes.author: fblissjr
custom_nodes.title: Shrug-Prompter: Unified VLM Integration for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive Vision-Language Model (VLM) integration system for ComfyUI with more intelligent prompt optimization, object detection, template support, and performance optimizations. Optimized for Wan2.1, Flux Kontext, and general purpose. Goes well with my other project, an MLX/llama.cpp server with hot swappable models and ollama api compatibility, (heylookitsanllm)[a/https://github.com/fblissjr/heylookitsanllm](https://github.com/fblissjr/heylookitsanllm)

custom_nodes.author: alessandroperilli
custom_nodes.title: Open Creative Studio Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A custom node suite to augment the capabilities of the [a/Open Creative Studio for ComfyUI](https://oc.studio/).

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Colormaster Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This project offers a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, dedicated to creating hexadecimal color palettes

custom_nodes.author: bbaudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SuperUltimateVaceTools
custom_nodes.description: powerful nodes for wan2.1 vace

custom_nodes.author: weekii
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-save-image-pro
custom_nodes.description: Professional-grade ComfyUI image saving plugin with support for multiple formats, custom naming, and advanced features.

custom_nodes.author: yamanacn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Kontext Duo Image Analyzer
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node designed for ComfyUI that leverages the multimodal large model Doubao from Volcengine Ark to intelligently compare two input images. You can provide two images and a custom text prompt. The node will send this information to the large model and return a detailed textual description of the similarities and differences between the two images.

custom_nodes.author: chuchu114514
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_proportion_solver
custom_nodes.description: This plugin includes two core nodes designed to handle proportion optimization tasks of varying complexity

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Mosaic
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for mosaic detection and creation.

custom_nodes.author: fblissjr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanActivationEditor
custom_nodes.description: editing activations in wanvideo

custom_nodes.author: Aryan185
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ExternalAPI-Helpers
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node for Flux Kontext Pro and Max models from Replicate

custom_nodes.author: ptmaster
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-PT-Keyframe-Camera
custom_nodes.description: The Comfyui-PT-Keyframe-Camera is a powerful tool designed to streamline the process of creating animations with keyframe cameras. It integrates seamlessly with existing workflows, allowing you to focus on your creativity without getting bogged down by technical details. This tool is perfect for animators, filmmakers, and anyone looking to add depth to their projects.

custom_nodes.author: lonelyowl13
custom_nodes.title: Artist tag randomizer for comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A node for including random artists usernames to a prompt.

custom_nodes.author: pictorialink
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen3-llama.cpp
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI QWen3 8b running based on llama.cpp, which only support the CUDA framework and do not support MPS.

custom_nodes.author: iacoposk8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fooocus Inpaint Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A simple wrapper for Fooocus's inpainting code, designed to replicate its outstanding results. Future improvements for a more refined and lightweight version are planned.

custom_nodes.author: FaraamFide
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ParamNodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-ParamNodes is a lightweight, dependency-free collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, designed to parameterize your workflows for API-driven generation. It provides a clean set of input nodes to control strings, numbers, booleans, and model/LoRA selections, along with a simple logic switch for conditional execution.

custom_nodes.author: namtb96
custom_nodes.title: OmniGen2 Simple Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node package for the OmniGen2 multimodal generation model.

custom_nodes.author: vrgamegirl19
custom_nodes.title: VRGameDevGirl Video Enhancement Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Film grain and color match nodes designed for high-quality frame-by-frame video enhancement in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: MitoshiroPJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Nearsighted Attention
custom_nodes.description: This node splits its self-attention Q to focus on nearby samples.

custom_nodes.author: MitoshiroPJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SaveImage SDLI
custom_nodes.description: SDLI (Stable Diffusion Latents in Imagefile) is file format, that contains latents and lossy (decoded) image. Detailed format is written at [a/SDLI Tools](https://github.com/MitoshiroPJ/sdli_tools).

custom_nodes.author: BigStationW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUi-Load-Image-And-Display-Prompt-Metadata
custom_nodes.description: This node displays the positive and negative prompts of a loaded ComfyUi image.

custom_nodes.author: pvlprk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Assistant Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that integrates with the OpenAI Assistants API.

custom_nodes.author: danTheMonk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Int and Float Conversion Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI custom node extension that provides utility nodes for converting between integer and float values.

custom_nodes.author: RamonGuthrie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RBG-ImageStitchPlus
custom_nodes.description: An advanced image stitching node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: kaipard
custom_nodes.title: Auto Aspect Latent Generator
custom_nodes.description: Add presets for latent and adjust the image size.

custom_nodes.author: wasilone11
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sync PVM Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to generate personalized video messages (PVM) using audio, video, and multilingual text prompts inside ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: EsesImageResize
custom_nodes.description: The 'Eses Image Resize' node offers comprehensive image resizing capabilities within ComfyUI. It supports various scaling modes including scaling by a specific ratio, target megapixels, or directly to fixed dimensions. The node provides framing options to handle aspect ratio changes, allowing users to 'Crop to Fit' (fill) the target frame or 'Fit to Frame' (letterbox) the image with a customizable fill color. It also generates and outputs a corresponding mask, with control over the letterbox area's color (black or white) within the mask.

custom_nodes.author: manifestations
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Globetrotter Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom ComfyUI nodes and utilities for generating AI image prompts representing the diverse attire, cultures, regions, and appearances of the world. This project is designed for easy extension to new countries, cultures, and body parts, using a modular JSON-based data structure and dynamic node generation.

custom_nodes.author: DesertPixelAi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DP Dynamic Random Styler
custom_nodes.description: A dynamic theme-based prompt generator for ComfyUI that creates versatile, random prompts optimized for face swap workflows.

custom_nodes.author: georgitsenov
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S3 Save Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for saving generated images directly to Cloudflare R2 (or S3-compatible) buckets using boto3, with secure random filename generation and public URL return.

custom_nodes.author: HappyXY
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AmazonBedrock
custom_nodes.description: use case of llm, image, video models on amazon bedrock

custom_nodes.author: BuffMcBigHuge
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Google-AI-Studio
custom_nodes.description: Google AI Studio by BuffMcBigHuge

custom_nodes.author: Hazukiaoi
custom_nodes.title: LM Studio Tools for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node pack designed for ComfyUI that seamlessly integrates the powerful LM Studio into your workflow, enabling you to perform a variety of tasks such as text generation and image understanding (Vision) using locally run LLMs.

custom_nodes.author: manifestations
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ethnic Outfits Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes for generating outfit prompts representing diverse ethnicities, cultures, and regions. Uses extensible JSON data for clothing, accessories, and poses, with “random/disabled” dropdowns for flexibility. Advanced prompt engineering is supported via Ollama LLM integration. Easily add new regions, ethnicities, or cultures by updating data files and creating lightweight node wrappers. Designed for artists, researchers, and developers seeking culturally rich, customizable prompt generation in ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: creepybits
custom_nodes.title: Save Image To Google Drive
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI node will save images directly to Google Drive by using Google's free API service.

custom_nodes.author: set-soft
custom_nodes.title: Audio Separation
custom_nodes.description: Audio separation (demixing) using AI. Separating Voices, Instruments, Bass, Drums, etc. CLI and ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: sunx.ai
custom_nodes.title: SunxAI Custom Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes developed by SunxAI for ComfyUI, including image loop processing and more.

custom_nodes.author: risunobushi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_sm4ll-Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates with the sm4ll-VTON API for virtual try-on functionality.
